messages.title: Labour Promises
messages.content: Building a better NHS. Reverse Tory cuts. Free prescriptions and tuition fees. Save our special schools.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Putting Respect and Decency Back into the Workplace
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating fairer working conditions by protecting the rights of workers, introducing a real living wage, and reversing Tory cuts.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS That Works For All Of Us
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guaranteed longer appointments and reverse the privatisation of the NHS.
Investing in green energy and tech, and fighting poverty and injustice.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Well Run Country Enjoying Nation's Public Transport
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Creating affordable, reliable fares and improving reliability of services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fragile! Look After the Earth Carefully!
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reducing carbon emissions, increasing investment in renewable energy, and protecting natural habitats.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Previous election results showing Labour behind Conservatives.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will work to get the best Brexit deal.
issues.economy: Labour promises to reward hard work in good jobs.
issues.education: Ensuring every child has access to good school placements.
issues.environment: Reducing carbon emissions and protecting natural habitats.
issues.government: Reversal of NHS privatisation and job creation.
issues.health: Reversing Tory NHS cuts, longer appointments.
issues.labourEmployment: Real living wage and protection of workers' rights.
issues.socialWelfare: Building a better NHS, reversing Tory cuts.

community.content: Investing in revitalizing local communities by providing good quality jobs and maintaining public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Josh Fenton-Glynn introduces himself, highlighting his local upbringing and commitment to serving Calder Valley.

examples: Putting respect and decency back into the workplace.
An NHS that works for all of us.
Fragile! Look after the Earth carefully!
Investing in green energy and tech.
Labour will work to get the best Brexit deal.
Good quality jobs and public services.
